steps.description: Read the contents of planner/planner.go to understand its current structure and how plans are stored and managed.
Based on the code structure, determine how a 'completed' plan is represented.
acceptance: Clearly defined what a 'completed' plan means in this context.

steps.description: Add the Go source code for the Compact() method to the Planner type.
acceptance: Compact() method is added to the Go file.
The method correctly removes completed plans.

steps.description: Use list_changes to see the modifications made to planner/planner.go.
Create a checkpoint with a conventional commit message summarizing the addition of the Compact() method.
